name: Rabbit Maze(兔子迷宫)
description:
This is a maze game.

In the level mode, there are fifteen maps available

1-10 levels are incremental random maps

11-15 15levels are non random maps,Each map has its own style, but the last map may require some different thinking to pass

In the endless mode

You can choose the size of the map according to your preference and the configuration of your computer

Maybe you can choose a custom 2x2 map and finish it instantly

Maybe you can choose a map of 10000x10000 and lose yourself in it for a lifetime

If you are tired

If you want to stay away from conflict

You can choose Zen mode

The main difference between Zen mode and endless mode is that you observe rather than participate

You can customize a map and see how AI can go out through its own less intelligent mind

Maybe you'll find

In life

We're like the AI that can't walk out of the maze
